net.marfgamer.jraknet.server

Class RakNetServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.marfgamer.jraknet.server.RakNetServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RakNetServerListener, GeminusRakNetPeer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RakNetServerBundleExample

    public class RakNetServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements GeminusRakNetPeer, RakNetServerListener
    This class is used to easily create servers using the RakNet protocol
    Author:
    MarfGamer
